instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2020: What is 820-2020? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2020</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> water damage 5v on charging
threads.message:
i was clean all, bad water damage on QD530 area, QD530 burn was take it out.
<SIGNAL>PP3V3_VSNS_IN</SIGNAL> 040 on diode mode.
FU400/500 area are clean but there was water damage on the charging port.
<SIGNAL>PPBUS_VMAIN</SIGNAL> 0.4V

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2020</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> water damage 5v on charging
threads.message:
T2 expects correct <SIGNAL>PBUS_VSENSE</SIGNAL> signal.
Replace QD530 and rebuild original circuit in the area.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2020</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> water damage 5v on charging
threads.message:
big problem:rolleyes:
there is a hole under <SIGNAL>SENSOR_PWR_EN</SIGNAL>, and his short i was clean ther but still short and it come from <CHIP>U8100</CHIP>, i was take out <CHIP>U8100</CHIP> ant now the <SIGNAL>SENSOR_PWR_EN</SIGNAL> is O.L...is <CHIP>U8100</CHIP> dead? and can be replaced?
